Sign Up for E-mail Notification

Current subscribers go here

Sign up to receive free e-mail notices when new series and/or country items are posted on the IMF website. Start by selecting either Countries or Series below:
Select your countries of interest to receive e-mail notices each time we post new material concerning those countries.
Select the series you are interested in (such as Press Releases, Speeches, or Working Papers). You will receive e-mail notices each time we post new items in the series you selected.
The IMF does not distribute, sell, or rent any information collected on this site. See our Privacy Policy.
